name: Network Service Scanning
description: Adversaries may attempt to enumerate networked services to find vulnerabilities. This often manifests as many short-lived flows to various ports (SYN scans).

name: Network DoS: Direct Exploitation
description: Adversaries may flood a target with ICMP, SYN, or UDP packets to exhaust system resources and deny service to legitimate users.

name: Standard Application Layer Protocol
description: Adversaries may communicate using standard protocols like HTTP, DNS, or HTTPS to blend in with normal traffic.
